Here is a list of articles which I feel can give you a good idea of what this blog site is all about.

  • BEAUTIFUL ZAMBIA VISITS LILAYI LODGE

    by Caroline N Muneku on 26 sept. 2019

    Beautiful Zambia took time to visit Lilayi Lodge to gain first hand experience of this safari haven nestled in the capital of Zambia, Lusaka. 12 miles from Lusaka and say a 35 minute drive from Manda Hill shopping complex. The lodge is set in a private game reserve which home to a unique elephant orphanage which we believe is one of only three in the world.

  • THIS IS ZAMBIA

    by Caroline N Muneku on 26 juin 2017

    Formerly called Northern Rhodesia as an integral part of Cecil Rhodesâ€™ Cape to Cairo vision, Zambia is in fact steeped in history dating all the way back to the African Stone Age. However, in many ways the famous Scottish missionary David Livingstone put the country on the European map as he came to the shores of Lake Tanganyika in search of the source of the Nile in the early 19th century.
